title: R Telemetry Workshop, November 2023
text:
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

1 + 1

[1] 2


For setup instructions go to setup instructions.

title: Exploring the BC Data Catalogue with R
text:
library(bcdata)


Attaching package: 'bcdata'


The following object is masked from 'package:stats':

    filter

bcdc_search("caribou")

List of B.C. Data Catalogue Records
Number of records: 43
Titles:
1: Causes of Caribou Mortality (other)
 ID: 64ff3af9-50c4-4914-a276-777b37eab2a2
 Name: causes-of-caribou-mortality
2: Boreal Caribou Habitat Data
This record has no resources. bcdata will not be able to access any
 data.
 ID: 9cd36e31-8981-4ba3-bc2c-ae355b2c9e4e
 Name: boreal-caribou-habitat-data
3: Caribou in British Columbia (other)
 ID: c95424ee-009b-4ecf-b0af-c3eb1065055f

 Name: itcha-ilgachuz-caribou-habitat-area
5: Caribou Herd Locations for BC (multiple, wms, kml, arcgis_rest)

title: Introduction to Telemetry Data
